body.name: COOFANDY Men's Rain Jacket with Hood Waterproof Lightweight Active Long Raincoat
features: 【Premium Fabric】High qualtity rain jacket made of 80% nylon,20% polyester. Extremely waterpoof and windproof, quick drying, touch soft and super comfortable wear feel.

【Waterproof】This long rain coat is covered with waterproof coating for quick drying.Smooth zippers with waterproof strip, buttons offer more secure protection. Velcro cuffs, below the knees length, adjustable hood and hem with elastic draw make sure a tight fit. The slim design delivers a more modern look.

【Multiple Use】The breathable fabric makes sure that you can throw this jacket over your favorite tee on a rainy day in the middle of the summer. You can also layer up under this jacket for fall or winter use. The matt finish and the slick look ensure that no one knows you are using a rain jacket as a spring/fall windbreaker. You can also use this jacket to protect your pea coat from getting wet on a snow day.

【Occassion】Hooded windbreaker jacket perfect for working in rain days, fishing, camping trip or hunting，bussiness trip, hiking, , outdoor party, adventure, theme parks, climbing, or any other outdoor activities. This full length rainjacket is also a great cosplay/game costume.
【Garment Care】Please wipe off the dirt with a cloth. Note: Please do not iron that would damage the waterproof wax. No bleach. Do not machine wash. Hang to dry.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: COOFANDY Men's Long Hooded Rain Jacket Outdoor Raincoat Waterproof Rain Wear COOFANDY focuses on men's wear and strives to provide you with the most innovative and quality products. This long field jacket features a technical water repellent coating for protection from rain and wind, making it an always-on-the-go choice for home and outdoor work in rainy weather.

COOFANDY Men's Quick Dry Waterproof Technical Rain Jacket Detail Video Made of 80% nylon and 20% polyester, this long raincoat has a precision waterproof coating, while being comfortable, breathable and lightweight. Suitable for head-to-toe protection in light rain to heavy rain.
Previous page Next page COOFANDY Lightweight & Waterproof & Windproof Raincoat for men 1 Raincoat with hood 2 Waterproof raincoat 3 Long rain jacket

Men's Lightweight Rain Trench Coat Waterproof Long Raincoat with Hood Previous page Next page This full lentgh rain jacket is characterized in waterproof, lightweight, windproof. Its surface covered with waterproof coating for quick drying. Smooth zippers with waterproof strip, buttons offer more secure protection. Velcro cuffs, below the knees length, adjustable hood and hem.

COOFANDY Men's Hooded Lightweight Rain Jacket For Many Occasions This rain jacket is multi-function. It perfect for hiking, camping or hunting, bussiness trip, outdoor party, adventure, fishing, theme parks, climbing, cycling, jogging or any other outdoor activities, also for daily working, agriculture, emergencies, etc.
When storing the raincoat, we should also pay special attention not to damage the waterproof layer of the cloth surface, and avoid sharp objects from scratching the raincoat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got my son one in black. It fit well and was waterproof and just right. I ordered it in red, also. This time it took a while to get here and I was concerned it would never arrive, but it finally arrived today. Yea! I’m very happy. Also, I like the Coofandy brand for clothes for my son, fair price, good quality, great classic style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great rain coat!
reviews.reviewText: This raincoat is very long, which is great! With tall boots, I can be totally protected. The material is a bit thin, but allows easy movement. The neck and hood fit very well. Oddly, the zipper pull is on the opposite side from the usual. This great coat is a very good deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heavy duty rain coat
reviews.reviewText: Long enough to keep your pants dry above your knees. Heave enough to withstand strong wind. Doesn't vent too good (condansades on layer cloves). Good buy for the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fahsyee Raincoat Women: Stylish, Functional, and Unisex Appeal
reviews.reviewText: I recently gifted the Fahsyee Raincoat Women, Rain Jacket Waterproof Raincoat Hooded Windbreaker Outdoor Long Active to a male relative of my wife's, and it turned out to be an absolute hit! Not only does he think the looks of this raincoat are outstanding, but he also believes it should be considered a unisex item due to its versatile appeal.The design of the Fahsyee Raincoat Women is truly impressive. It strikes the perfect balance between style and functionality. The long length provides ample coverage, keeping the wearer dry even in heavy rain. The hooded windbreaker feature adds an extra layer of protection against wind and rain, ensuring optimal comfort during outdoor activities.What sets this raincoat apart is its unisex appeal. The sleek and modern design is suitable for both men and women, making it a versatile choice for anyone in need of a reliable rain jacket. The recipient of this gift was particularly pleased with how well it fit and how flattering it looked, despite it being marketed as a women's raincoat.In terms of performance, the Fahsyee Raincoat Women delivers outstanding waterproof protection. The material is durable and effectively repels water, keeping the wearer dry and comfortable even in heavy downpours. The windproof features provide an additional layer of defense against the elements.The quality craftsmanship of this raincoat is evident. The stitching is sturdy, and the attention to detail is commendable. It feels like a high-end product that will withstand the test of time, ensuring long-lasting durability.Overall, I highly recommend the Fahsyee Raincoat Women, Rain Jacket Waterproof Raincoat Hooded Windbreaker Outdoor Long Active not only to women but also to men seeking a stylish and functional raincoat. Its outstanding looks, unisex appeal, and reliable waterproof performance make it a fantastic choice for outdoor enthusiasts. Consider this raincoat as a versatile option for anyone in need of a dependable and fashionable rain jacket!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Happy with purchase. Keeps the rain off. Lightweight PVC fabric backed material. Includes zippered and snap closure. Used as a windbreaker also. Can be packed into lunchbox or pack when not needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It ripped from the first wear
reviews.reviewText: Nice rain coat but not a good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding rain coat
reviews.reviewText: Just as advertised! Excellent fit, quality material, light weight and visually appealing. I would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice / Good arm length for tall women
reviews.reviewText: Very nice rain jacket. It’s hard to find a nice jacket (cold weather or wet weather) for tall girls because sleeves are always too short. The sleeves on this jacket are perfect. Jacket zips and snaps. Hood fits nicely and cinches with drawstring. Length is long to keep everything below the belt dry. Wear this with rubber boots and you’re dry all over. Fits true to size. I appreciate the quality for the price. Not bulky. Will fold up in a backpack at a theme park (bought ours for Disney). Very pleased.
The jacket it's self is nice, not to sure how long the zipper will last it's rather stiff and hard to do up but it has the snaps so it will still be useable.

I have had this coat for a week now and have worn it twice in the rain as we get a fair amount of rain here in BC . This coat is exactly as described. I am 6 feet tall and It fits me well with good room available for walking in the rain. It is long enough to cover the legs below the knees. The hood is big enough to cover my face.It does not have a lining so will work well in the summer. In cooler weather it is large enough to give room to wear a heavier sweat coat or puffy jacket to keep warm.It appears to be relatively well made with a decent zipper and snap buttons.I like it very much.
Der Mantel ist qualitativ sehr gut und schick nur leider sind die Ärmel zu kuru

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: I'm short, 5' 5", so it covers down to my ankles.
